doc.previous: The spoken language has been influenced by the literary one but continues to preserve characteristic forms The dialects show various non standard grammatical features citation needed some of which are archaisms or descendants of old forms since discarded by the literary language
doc.after: See History of the Russian language for an account of the successive foreign influences on Russian
